duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with candidates to determine qualifications, conduct interviews, and guide them through the pre-employment process.
Coordinate communication with candidates and hiring managers, including all hiring/selection responsibilities.
Work with the recruiting team to evaluate candidate flow and determine best talent acquisition strategies.
Utilize Applicant Tracking System (ATS) to manage a database of open positions and applications.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree in human resources, business, or related field preferred
